phrases: Is there no other way to save...
You can do as you like with him now.
I swear...
I will save you.
Another unfamiliar ceiling.
Ow!
So they barely managed to save my life,
and these are the scars...
Emilia...
I guess now I owe her yet another debt.
I do not know about that.
This time, you produced results equal to the effort invested,
so I doubt Lia will think of it as a debt.
Puck...
Good morning, Subaru.
You say these are results equal to my effort, but I do not remember anything
after I got nommed on by those dogs in the forest.
Nommed on?
That is a cute way to put it.
But it was actually...
Munch, gobble, snarf, chew, chomp, snap, crunch!
More like that.
With all those sound effects, I should definitely be dead now.
I think I am five or six arms short for all that.
Yeah, the blue-haired maid took care of the rest of the damage.
She was in awful shape.
Though she heals fast, thanks to her demon transformation.
By the time she carried you back to the village,
she had no visible injuries.
Do not scare me for no reason...
Anyway, Rem went back to the village?
And what about the kids?
Was the curse removed?
No worries there.
Betty and I took care of it, so all's well!
Your judgment was right on the mark!
Clap, clap, clap.
Has Emilia been here all night?
Yeah.
To heal you,
she drained her resources right down to her odo,
so you should let her sleep.
Barusu, you are awake?
Ram...
Listen, uh... I mean, about Rem...
How shameful you are,
pestering others for food so soon after being that badly injured.
Maybe some dog rubbed off on you from the bites.
How the heck does some dog rub off?
Eat this.
Huh?
Sofubozu!
Delicious, is not it?
I thought I was going to die!
But yes, it was good!
It is freshly made.
I mean...
Freshly steamed.
Why do you look so proud of yourself?!
Okay, okay.
You can have another, so be quiet and eat it.
And well...
As for last night, you have my honest thanks.
Nice work.
Nice work?
Always with the condescending tone.
Was it something deserving of your thanks?
When a domain's people suffer any loss, its lord is held liable.
If that pack of ulgarm had further endangered those children...
You were right to do as you did.
Ulgarm?
That is what those black mabeasts are called?
Yes, but it is all right.
I reconnected the broken barrier,
so the village is safe.
I kept an eye on the barrier overnight, to ensure there were no problems.
No ulgarm should be able to cross it and enter the village.
So you can relax.
Beako...
Hey!
I heard you helped remove the curse from the kids.
Thanks.
No big deal.
Betty only helped because Bubby asked, I suppose.
I have something more important to discuss.
What did you bring me all the way out here to say?
In less than half a day,
you will die, I suppose.
You do not look as disturbed as I expected.
I thought you would scream and cry, I suppose.
The curse still is not lifted, then?
When the pack of mabeasts attacked you in the forest,
they planted another curse deep inside you.
Can I ask why this one cannot be removed?
That is simple, I suppose.
Too many curses have been placed on you, making it too complex to remove.
Too many curses?
When there is only one, removing it is as simple as untying a knot.
But the curses on you are a complex web of many threads,
too tangled to undo.
Well, I get the idea that it is high in difficulty.
But why half a day?
After half a day, mabeasts replenish mana by activating their spells.
The curse those mabeasts used drains a target's mana, I suppose.
In other words, they made you mabeast food.
So they attack people because they are hungry?
That is a wild animal for you.
So simple-minded!
I guess we should be thankful they have not gotten hungry before now...
You...
You are not even scared, I suppose?
I am telling you how much time you have left, you know.
Well, sure, I am scared.
But I doubt you came here just to tell me I am going to die.
I do not think you are that mean.
What do you know about me, I suppose?
If nothing else, I feel I have known you four times longer than I really have.
You make no sense!
But it is a fact that the chance for you to be saved is much lower now.
Tell me...
Just how low it is.
We are talking about eating by means of a spell.
If the one that is eating dies,
logic says the meal would be canceled, I suppose.
So that is it...
I just have to kill the things that cursed me.
But there are too many of them.
That is why Bubby has not told that silly girl about the curse.
Yeah, if Emilia knew, she would definitely try to do more than she is capable of...
Which makes me really happy,
but also really scared.
Man, the difficulty level is seriously demonic!
This is just plain impossible.
I might as well give up
So you are going to give up?
Is there no other way to save him?
His head must be hurting, I suppose.
That is not surprising.
That is all, I suppose.
You can do as you like with him now.
I swear...
I will save you.
It cannot be.
Where... is Rem?
Beako...
Beatrice, where is Rem?!
In her position, what would you do, I suppose?
I cannot ignore what you just said.
Ram...
Beatrice-sama,
Rem did not go to the forest alone, did she?
No one else needs to get hurt anymore!
Why?
Why would Rem go to such lengths for me?
Hey, hold on!
Let go of me, Barusu!
Right now, I am not calm enough to be kind!
If you want to save Rem,
and if you consider me an ally at all, listen to me!
Do you know where Rem is?
If I use my clairvoyance, I will!
Clairvoyance?
It is a power that allows me to see
what the bugs and animals on my wavelength are seeing.
Then they are like your security cameras?
Well, if we can use it to get to Rem, fine.
So, are you the kind of maid that fights?
What does that even mean?
It means I am going to the forest with you.
You are going to follow me?
Yeah.
I am bound to slow you down in a fight, you know.
If you expect that I can fight like Rem does in her demon form, I cannot.
You are twins, right?
If Rem is a demon, are not you a demon, too?
Unlike Rem, I am hornless.
I can only use a rather extreme bit of wind magic.
Going to retrieve the younger sister
would mean giving up on your own life.
You do understand that, I suppose?
That is not quite right.
Let me correct you.
Forming the habit of giving up because you are used to dying is dumb.
Life is precious!
You only get one!
When you guys went through so much to save mine, I realized that.
So if you do not mind, I am going to struggle pathetically.
Let us go make a comeback!
I have bounced back from the terrible state I was in.
I am a greedy guy.
And I want to see this story's continuation, with me in it.
Now, let us get moving to our last big showdown!
Bring it on, Fate-sama!
You gave a pretty heroic speech back there.
But when I see you close to becoming nothing but baggage,
it is difficult to hide my disappointment.
I am still recovering, so my energy is spent, and I am low on blood...
Oh, and I did not get to hear Emilia-tan say, See you soon.
Until you say, I am home, last night's See you soon is still in effect.
I-Is that how it works?
Besides, did not you get something from someone other than Emilia-sama?
Yeah, something really awesome.
Take this.
It is the sharpest sword in the village.
Thanks, man.
We are counting on you.
Subaru!
Subaru!
Hey, you guys!
You are awake?
Where are you going?
Back into the forest?
Do not go back there, Subaru!
I will be fine.
Do not worry.
I am not going anywhere.
What is the sword for?
This?
It is a thank you gift from all of us.
I want to thank you, too!
Hey!
You can have this!
And this!
Candy, a pretty stone...
And...
There was a freaking bug in it!
Damn brats, sneaking that in while I was distracted!
I will lecture them later!
It is just proof that they admire you.
I wonder what they see in a man like you.
In a child's pure eyes,
my true, manly nature shines...
Also, I am not the only one they like.
You could tell, right?
Yes...
Take this, too!
Hey!
Why did you put dirt in there?
Just accept it!
Ram-chi!
We also want to thank Rem-rin, so bring her later!
Promise, Ram-chi!
Barusu, I am going to use my clairvoyance.
Wait a moment.
Barusu, something is watching us right now.
What?
Up there.
Where?
More are coming.
Hey!
D-Do not just walk off!
Anyway, why does every individual lose their head when they see you?
I do not understand.
Because you seem so weak?
After all that hesitation, that is your conclusion?
How rude!
Then, perhaps it is because you seem like a wimp.
That does not change the root of what you are saying, Onee-sama!
Hey, can I ask what that hornless thing you mentioned means?
Nothing special.
Just as it sounds,
it is another name for a foolish demon that lost its horn.
I got into a bit of trouble and lost my only horn.
Ever since, I have relied on Rem for everything.
I guess I should not have asked, huh?
Why?
Well, I do not know how important horns are to the race you call demons,
but I assume it is a pretty serious problem.
I just thought asking about it might have been insensitive.
Back then was one thing.
But now, things have calmed down.
By losing my horn, there are things I have gained and lives I have saved.
I am sure Rem does not feel the same way, though.
Huh?
Originally, members of the demon race had two horns,
but twins are born with just one horn each.
That is why twins are detested.
And it is customary to dispose of them immediately after birth.
But Rem and I were allowed to live.
A demon's horns awaken its demon instincts,
allowing it to devour mana, heightening combat ability.
But if one is reckless,
the recoil will leave one battered.
I do not want to see Rem like that.
Are you worried because you care for Rem?
Of course I am.
It is true that she is stronger than I am,
but that is no reason not to worry about her.
No matter what we are told to do, she does it far better.
But I am her older sister.
I will not waver from that position.
Okay, I get it.
I have got an idea.
So do not worry.
We will bring Rem back safe!
If my idea is right, they are sure to come.
They will be drawn here by my attempt to tell her about Return by Death.
Ram, the thing is, I can retur
What is that?
I made a wager that brought a bit of pain with it.
What did you do, Barusu?
The wind is erratic, and I smell approaching beasts.
A lot of them...
And we have not found Rem yet!
Well, do not worry.
I am pretty sure we will cross paths soon.
What makes you so sure?
Because of the witch's lingering scent!
Rem's goal is to hunt down all the mabeasts, right?
The mabeasts will be drawn to the witch's scent,
and come right to me.
Then Rem will have no choice but to follow them toward me.
I call it Operation: Natsuki Subaru is the Bait!
Okay, I am going to have to rely on you to fight, so go for it...
When this is over, look objectively at what you just said
until you wish you were dead!
This is what I get for believing you when you said you could fight!
Well, I was fighting, was not I?
My strength just did not hold out as long as I thought it would...
Damn it!
Crap!
D-Damn it all!
We were almost dead meat...
If we fall, we will both be in trouble.
Barusu, can you climb up?
I would like to make it up by sheer willpower,
but the mabeasts waiting there are a problem
The sharpest sword!
El Fula!
That was close...
Seriously, Ram-sama had timing like Buddha...
Huh?
Hey, Ram?
H-Hey!
Damn it.
You cannot be serious.
Shit, this timing could not be worse...
Rem!
Thank goodness you are alive!
We are saved!
Damn it.
She can turn into a demon, but she cannot control it?
Hey, Rem!
My name is Natsuki Subaru!
A completely useless trainee in odd jobs...
The Roswaal mansion's most promising servant!
I have always caused trouble for you and Ram,
but we have been friends at times,
and we have fought at times
Trying to beat me to death while I am still talking is bad manners...
Now's my chance...
Damn, it is no use!
I cannot ignore her!
Take the plunge, Subaru.
Men are about guts, and women are about beauty!
So...
Quit making that scary face, and try to smile, Rem!
I can Return by
Her horn...
You are awake?
That should have been the perfect moment.
You have good intuition, Onee-sama!
What about her horn?
It is the horn that is making Rem a demon.
One good, solid hit should bring her back to normal.
You are sure?
I am.
I think.
I hope.
That is vague!
A hit to that one spot.
Does not it seem impossible?
Muster your wisdom and courage, and do something.
I actually do have an idea for something we could do,
but it will make you mad.
If it will bring my sister back to her senses, I will not get mad.
Really?
Absolutely.
You swear to Ros-chi?
That is the most reckless name you could have chosen.
Yes, I swear to Roswaal-sama.
All right!
Heave...
Ho!
I freaked out!
I did not have the guts for that last step!
If I let this chance go by, there will not be others!
Smile, Rem!
Today, I am fanatical like a real demon!
Fanatical Methods Like a Demon
